summary: Adds Clothing as Armor and Light Armor to all the Smithing perks.
descriptionHtml:
Nothing gets replaced in this mod everything is stand alone so it shouldnt conflict with any other mods.
If you have texture replacers for vanilla items they will change the look of these items but wont change the stats in any way.

Latest update adds.
Fixed College Boots
Added Savior hide
Changed storm cloak officer helm name to Bear helm under the steel section to match the rest of the set.




All the clothes previously added also are now under Hide section at the Tanning Rack as reguler Clothing no armor rating so for mages that just want to craft the clothes and dont want the armor rating you now can.

Added Dark Brotherhood armor as craftable and no enchantments located in the steel section and requires Glass Smithing perk, Also added the Short Sleeve Dark Brotherhood Chest which is male only, on female characters is shows up as the normal dark brotherhood chest.

Added Nightingale Armor as Craftable and no enchantments located in the Daedric section and requires the Daedric Smithing perk.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mod Description:

Craftable Light Armor Clothing.

This Mod lets you craft clothing at the Tanning Rack. Most recipes require Linen Wraps / Leather / Leather Strips. Elven Crafting per Required.

Armored Circlets are Craftable under the Elven section at the Smithing Forge.

Also Adds Craftable Linen Wraps to the Tanning Rack under misc. To Craft a linen wrap you will need 2 Tundra Cotton or you can loot Linen wraps in most ruins where you would normally find zombies or skeletons.

This mod is a Work in Progress i will be adding more clothes to it when i get them done.

Nothing gets replaced in this mod everything is stand alone so it shouldnt conflict with any other mods.

So far i have the armor rating for the clothes on par with Elven armor.

pls leave some feed back on things like suggested armor rating ect.
